Jobs

Here're the jobs by sponsors.

M3, Inc.
M3's mission is to use technology to increase the number of people who can live longer and happier lives, and address the worldwide challenge of managing rapidly rising medical costs.

Our engineers are highly skilled in Java, Scala, and always try to innovate using new technologies.

We're always looking for talented, independent developers to join our team - together, let's help lead a revolution in health care!
(Sorry, the below job description is Japanese only):
